column1: ese ubona ha kentsekeubapadisa uhopola hore ketlabapala le wena
utlatsosa ngwana wena ka lerata lena lahao
hleso ke ya mang ntho eo
sekeng lahlodiya hle batho ba modimo
wena ketlare mme mamello autlele le tsona maseru kwana
ketlare autlele le dieta le phenti
hela sela se kae seo unengukhothola ka sona
e tloo le tsona dile pedi
ee bo tsane dieta tseno tsaka tsentso wena tsentso ee
na e thata le yona ee
mme mamello ohlileore orata hobona hore na hokhotholwa jwang
ha ele bohale ke ha ele jwang manyeo
ha ketsebe na ha ele bohale ke ha ele jwang
jwale utlaetsa jwang he ha utseba
jwale ure utlaekhothola ele thata tjee
rekhotholeng hore efele tsebo poone ena
